headline: Boeing Hires Northrop Executive to Revamp Pentagon Projects
summary: Boeing  has poached an executive from defense rival  Northrop Grumman  to run its Phantom Works division, which oversees research efforts for its Pentagon business and is involved in bidding for U.S. government projects.  Colin Miler, a former Air Force commander who oversaw aeronautics engineering at Northrop, will take over the division, the jet maker told employees on Thursday.  The Phantom Works division is also being combined into a single division.

headline: Bell-Boeing Secures Contract to Aid CMV-22 Osprey Aircraft Program
summary: Bell-Boeing, a joint venture between BA and Bell Helicopter, an unit of TXT, secures a contract involving the CMV-22 Osprey aircraft.
